title: whatdafukisgoingon
body: So my friends list is empty, even when I turn on 'show offline friends' setting. Can't say shit in chat in champ select or lobby but can talk in game. So weird, what's going on Rito.

replies.body: Hey all, we found and fixed some problems. Anyone able to confirm this is resolved for them now?

Yeah I have the same issue here, played a few games yesterday and when I finished one my friends list started bugging out telling me people were on that weren't.

Tried logging on this morning and it's been wiped, no friends for me.
